title: Drawing, "Drawing for a Nave Elevation", 18th century
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and gray wash on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and ink along lower margin: Scala di Canne g Palermitana.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Drawing of a two tiered wall decor with candelabrum, statues, columns and pediments.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing for a Nave Elevation", 18th century.
18th century. Pen and black ink, brush and gray wash on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-3394.
